get_youtube_comments.description: Fetch comments from  YouTube video with options to sort and limit results.

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the YouTube video to fetch comments from. (e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID)

props.name: limit
props.description: The number of comments to retrieve (default is 10, maximum is 100).

props.name: sortBy
props.description: The sorting order for the comments.

get_youtube_details.description: Get detailed information about any YouTube video including title, description, view count, likes, dislikes, duration, and channel information.

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the YouTube video you want to get details from. (e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID)

get_youtube_summary.description: Generates an AI-powered summary of a YouTube video.

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the YouTube video to summarize. (e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID)

get_youtube_transcript.description: Extract the full transcript with timestamps from any YouTube video that has captions or subtitles available.

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the YouTube video to get the transcript from. (e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID)
